name: vite-plugin-pack-info
description: Vite plugin generates an information file or fingerprint of a package after the construction is complete
author: robin (https://github.com/laibin-wang)

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && npm run renameESM
scripts.renameESM: node -e "require('fs').rename('dist/esm/index.js', 'dist/esm/index.mjs', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Build successful!') })"
